price: They are those who purchased misguidance for guidance, but their trade was profitless, and they were not guided.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشۡتَرَوُاْ ٱلضَّلَٰلَةَ بِٱلۡهُدَىٰ فَمَا رَبِحَت تِّجَٰرَتُهُمۡ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُهۡتَدِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna ish'tarawū al-ḍalālata bil-hudā famā rabiḥat tijāratuhum wamā kānū muh'tadīna
